title: Bebefinn Sing-Along Movie: Into the Pinkfong World
overview: In the middle of the night, Finn mysteriously vanishes into a tablet while playing Baby Shark Hide and Seek! As he explores the magical Pinkfong World in search of Baby Shark, Finn's worried siblings, Bora and Brody, turn to Pinkfong for help. Using magical powers and a can-do attitude, Pinkfong guides them through exciting challenges. But with the tabletâ€™s battery draining fast, can they rescue Finn before Dad wakes up?
